item.description:
Free Ron Paul book for attendees!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Facebook RSVP here.

On the agenda: state anti-NDAA legislation, CT for Liberty media production, potential educational forums / documentary viewings, working with other CT groups (Oath Keepers, etc.) with common interests, travel options for the August Tampa events (Paulfest, Ron Paul Rally, Veteran's March / RNC), plus additional topics as they come up.

We'll have a dozen copies of Ron Paul's NY Times best selling book, "End the Fed" free for those who attend. The book has a list price of $21.99 (and is currently on Amazon for $14.95).

Join us as we discuss and put into action our goal of spreading freedom in Connecticut. Ron Paul's 2012 presidential campaign has reignited the fires of liberty in the Constitution State and we plan to carry that momentum into ongoing projects.

Please come out and contribute your thoughts and ideas into the mix. Our meetup members come from various social, religious and political backgrounds; everyone is invited to participate as long as you respect personal liberty.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the tables to the right in the back.
item.name: CT for Liberty Organizational Meetup
